programme.title: Taj (Ep23)

programme.title: Ayyoub (Ep17)

programme.title: Golden Boy (Ep35)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2022 Fareed is a reckless young man who prompts his grandfather to force him to marry, thinking he will learn to take responsibility. programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: There's no ARRGH in "Team": Sonic and the crew of the Angel's Voyage aren't the only ones after the No Place Shard. The Chaos Council co-opted Nine's Shatterdrive tech and want it back too! (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Say My Name: The members of Danger Force are given terrible nicknames live on TV, so they come up with a plan to announce to the world who they really are. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Cape Fear: Phoebe tries to get back in superhero training, but when she sneaks out to a party and saves someone's life, she asks Max to take the credit, and he becomes a hero. (S2, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Call of Lunch Duty: Phoebe discovers that Max is behind the latest pranks at school, but when she refuses to give up his secret to the principal, she must face the consequences. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Let's Make a Steal: Captain Man gets Henry a spot on his favourite game show in an attempt to investigate a string of robberies. But Henry soon finds himself a victim too! (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Super Volcano: Activity in a dormant super volcano under Swellview makes Henry and Ray think the world is ending. Piper is convinced she has a gluten intolerance. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Tricky Times: With the eclipse rapidly approaching and the final riddle solved, the kids must put their heads together and figure out how to stop their enemy and get to the treasure first. (S3, ep 28)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: A Very Special Girl!: Granny Pina is anxious and busy, because a very special guest is coming to visit: her granddaughter Isotta. The cats discover that young girl can talk to animals! (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Ghost Cat: Word has spread out that there's a ghost cat in town. A presence may be haunting the neighbourhood! This is definitely a mystery the Buffycats want to solve. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Flying Treasure Hunt: Competitors must move without touching the ground to reach the final treasure. Meatball is happy to compete, but will he manage to prove he is a real flying cat? (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best's sound effects threaten to derail Bester's one chance to shine in 'Stage Struck', then in 'Ball Count', a case of missing golf balls escalates into a full-on mountain rescue mission. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Patrick suddenly grows a beard, he decides it's time to act like a grown-up in 'Squidward's School For Grown-Ups', and then in 'Oral Report', SpongeBob must face his fear of public speaking.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton tries to befriend Squidward to steal the Krabby Patty formula in 'Sweet and Sour Squidward', and then in 'The Googly Artiste', Patrick's painted rocks with googly eyes are an artistic hit.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy and Hefty disguise themselves as girls in 'Some Like It Not', then in 'Joke's on You', Vanity tires of Jokey's exploding box and decides to boobytrap it with an even bigger boom. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy finds himself turned into a monster in 'The Scariest Smurf', and in 'DRIIINNGGGGG!', Handy builds Lazy a special alarm clock to keep him awake, but it keeps everyone else awake too! (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton is frustrated that people think he's cute in 'Say Awww!', then in 'Patrick the Mailman', Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Yard Sale: GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Situation - Grim: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thunder in Paradise - Part 1: The Thundermans are off to Hawaii for summer vacation, but Phoebe has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and is all set on world domination. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Thumb Buddies Back: The Thumb Buddies return from space and are intent on getting revenge against Captain Man and Kid Danger. (S4, ep 21)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs take some nature lessons in 'Back to Nature', then in 'Okey-Dokey!', Jokey has a new prank - giving Grouchy a potion that makes him say okey dokey to every request. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove that alchemy is more powerful than magic in 'Smurfy Magic Duel', then in 'Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb', Brainy's new invention backfires and leaves him brainless. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns that imitation is the sincerest form of flattery in 'Mimic Madness', and then in 'House Worming', SpongeBob finds that some unwelcome visitors have moved in.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward is so tired before a big audition that SpongeBob and Patrick can't wake him up in 'Snooze You Lose', then in 'Krusty Catering', Mr. Krabs and his crew must cater a high-class fancy party.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luna worries that her ambition to be a rocker is unrealistic in 'Roadie to Nowhere', then in 'A Fridge Too Far', when food Lincoln saved in the fridge gets taken, a territory war ensues. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Carol Pingrey's photo gets more likes than Lori's in 'Selfie Improvement', and in 'No Place Like Homeschool', Lola is being temporarily homeschooled, and the other kids try to get in on it. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny's mother visits from the old country in 'Which Witch is Which?', and then in 'Get Off My Lawnie', Granny Tentacles gets her own spin-off show. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs in 'The Krusty Bucket', then in 'Squid's on a Bus', Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Date of Emergency: Phoebe fakes a romance after feeling left out with her friends all in relationships, but keeping her lie going proves to be harder than she expected. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 3: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf would like a dragon in 'I Want a Dragon', then in 'Magic Meltdown', an abandoned cauldron takes revenge. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Great Smurf Games: The winning team will receive a magical sphere that grants its owner one wish. Clumsy has got his heart set on taking part so that he can win this coveted prize. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick helps with Squidward's paper route in 'Pat-per Route', then in 'Day of the Dartfish', The Dartfish family finds a thief. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds are invited to stay in a spooky castle in 'A Bite of Transylvania', then in 'Greece is the Word', during a tour of the Parthenon, Lincoln gets sent back to Ancient Greece. (S8, ep 7)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: It Takes One to No Place: Sonic lands in the deep seas of The No Place, where pirate versions of his friends are led by Knuckled the Dredd. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton's computer wife Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab after being replaced by a newer model in 'Karen 2.0', and in 'InSPONGEiac', SpongeBob can't get to sleep, and asks Patrick to help.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Tide and Prejudice: The Thundermans are visited by High Tide, the former protector of Secret Shores. He decides to take back his old role, even if it puts Jinx and Booch in danger. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: New Friends: Taylor is transported to a nightmarish version of Rock Island where she doesn't exist, and her friends don't know her. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry's Frittle Problem: When Henry's dad gets an offer for a new job, Henry and Ray go undercover to try and stop Henry's dad from getting the job and prevent Henry from having to move. (S4, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toddler Invasion: When The Toddler takes control of the Man Cave, Charlotte and Jasper have to find a way to sneak into the Man Cave and free Kid Danger and Captain Man. (S4, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Doppel-Gamers: Billy and Nora bond with an outgoing pair of teens at a gamer's convention, making Max and Phoebe aware of much they have been neglecting their younger siblings. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Floral Support: Max uses Phoebe to help retrieve his chronicle of evil deeds from the school's confiscation closet, but goes too far in breaking her trust to pull off his plan. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Trojan Force: When Danger Force's fingerprints show up on crime scene evidence, they must break into police headquarters and wipe the prints, or their secret identities will be ruined. (S2, ep 25)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Jade Gets Crushed: Andre is working on a song with Jade, and gets a crush on her. Tori tries to help him get over it, but Andre just can't keep his feelings a secret. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Livin' on a Dare: Does being a rebel make you popular? When Julie finds a banned game in the Lost & Found, she realizes it's the perfect way for her to become a school rebel. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Stuck In Two Holes: Captain Man and Kid Danger are each stuck in a hole? Charlotte and Jasper had better go help, because Schwoz is taking a bean bath! (S3, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Balloons of Doom: When Dr. Minyak takes the Man Fans hostage, Captain Man and Kid Danger have to find a way to rescue them without Dr. Minyak seeing them move. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thunder in Paradise - Part 1: The Thundermans are off to Hawaii for summer vacation, but Phoebe has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and is all set on world domination. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thunder in Paradise - Part 2: The Thundermans are off to Hawaii for summer vacation, but Phoebe has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and is all set on world domination. (S4, ep 21)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Distress Call: When Taylor and the gang hear a radio distress call coming from themselves, from the future. They race to find the source of the message. Ellis thinks he has time-travelled. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Taylors: The gang inadvertently creates a mischievous clone of Taylor! When clone Taylor runs off, it's down to Ellis and Taylor to find how to reverse the cloning process. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Avoid the Void: In The Void, Shadow intercepts Sonic's latest Shatterspace transverse, for a personal face-to-fist encounter. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Avoid the Void: In The Void, Shadow intercepts Sonic's latest Shatterspace transverse, for a personal face-to-fist encounter. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Villains' Night: Danger Force and Captain Man go undercover as bad guys to catch a criminal. If their cover is blown, they'll have to fight all of Swellview's toughest villains at once! (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: One Hit Thunder: When Max uses personal information about Phoebe and Link in a song for his band, he causes a rift. Hank and Barb try to teach Billy and Nora a valuable lesson. (S2, ep 24)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Girl With the...: Phoebe joins the 'cool' group for a class project, to find that they don't want to work as hard as she does. Max joins her group and lets them do the work. (S2, ep 25)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Hunter Street

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Sir Lamp, The Great Golfer: Lampo is excluded from the golf tournament organized by Boss. So, disguised as great golfer Sir Lamp, he challenges Boss to show him that golf is for everycat. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Pilou And Her Loose Tooth: Pilou notices she has a loose tooth. She doesn't want to touch it because she's afraid it could be painful. Isotta suggests she visit Mimì, the pediatrician cat. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Scribbly, The Stray Kitten: It's Feline Good Deeds Day and Scribbly, a stray kitten, wants to lend a paw and make new cat friends. Unfortunately, Boss deceives him into causing mischief. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement in 'Bucket Pants', then in 'A Best Too Far', Best listens to other people's ideas during the Capture the Flag contest. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SquarePants Family Vacation: When SpongeBob and Patrick get lost on a family road trip to the Great Barrier Reef, they end up on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick gets some luxury pampering in 'Patrick's Staycation', and then in 'Walking The Plankton', Plankton wonders who's looking after the Krabby Patty formula while Mr Krabs is on a cruise.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy dons a superhero costume and tries to conquer his fear in 'My Smurf the Hero', then in 'Alien Smurf', An Alien child visits the Smurfs and puts them under his spell. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy and Storm build their own flying machines in 'Smurf Your Seat Belts', then in 'Leaf It Alone', the Smurfs discover Gargamel's plan to lure them to his field. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton joins the League of E.V.I.L in 'Captain Pipsqueak', then in 'Plane to Sea', SpongeBob and Patrick take Squidward on a plane to a tropical resort.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job in 'Squidina's Little Helper', then in 'I Smell a Pat', The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: It Takes One to No Place: Sonic lands in the deep seas of The No Place, where pirate versions of his friends are led by Knuckled the Dredd. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thunder in Paradise - Part 2: The Thundermans are off to Hawaii for summer vacation, but Phoebe has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and is all set on world domination. (S4, ep 21)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Up The Stairs!: Henry and Ray's friendship is put to the test when they must make the half mile trek up the stairs to make a surprise meal by a celebrity chef in Junk-N-Stuff. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel turns himself into a snail in 'Shell Game', then in 'Blossom Goes Wild!', Blossom gets into a fight with Storm and Lily, leaves the village, and moves into the forest with Wild. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy is afraid a ghost is haunting his house in 'No Smurf Out!', then in 'Souffle Shuffle', Chef sprains his ankles and has to rely on Greedy to bring his souffle to the Spring Festival. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant in 'SpongeBob's Place', then in 'Plankton Gets the Boot', Plankton gets kicked out of the house.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their 'Life Insurance' protects them from any danger, then in 'Burst Your Bubble', SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, and everyone in town wants one!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynn desperately wants to win a basketball championship in 'Net Gains', then in 'Pipe Dreams', Mom and Dad are sick of waiting for the bathroom, so they build a secret one of their own. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde set Coach and Mrs. Johnson up in 'Teacher's Union', then in 'Head Poet's Anxiety', Luan mentors Lucy, teaching her how to manage the ups and downs of a life in the arts. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Patrick Show sells merchandise in 'The Patrick Show Cashes In', then in 'The Star Games', Patrick hosts a series of game shows. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick looking for a lost action figure in 'Swamp Mates', then in 'One Trick Sponge', SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Orange is the New Max: Phoebe worries that Max will revert to his evil ways after he is asked to give a prison talk, but her efforts to protect Max from himself do more harm than good. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Sick & Wired: Thinking that Henry is not telling the truth about being sick, Ray plants cameras and microphones in Henry's house to catch him in a lie. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel clones himself to capture all one hundred Smurfs in 'His Own Worst Enemy', and in 'Tree of Knowledge', the Smurfs unwittingly ask Dimwitty for advice when he gets stuck in a tree. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf in 'Reaching for the Stars', then in 'The Dream Team', Handy puts together an A-team to get his jet pack back from Gargamel's hovel. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The show finds an adorable new star in 'Patty-Poo', then in 'Swaptoberfest', the Star family swap identities. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln's crew try to heist a rare comic book in 'Karaless Whisper', then in 'Dollars and Scents', Miguel starts a perfume line. (S8, ep 8)

programme.title: Sonic Prime

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick see who can hold a funny face the longest in 'Face Freeze!', then in 'Glove World R.I.P.', SpongeBob and Patrick spend one last day at Glove World before it closes down forever.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Prank U Next: Max seeks help dealing with a mystery prankster at school from his old principal, who was always the target of his pranks. But Max fails to stop the pranks, and quits! (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Dig: The gang discover a dinosaur fossil which leads to a shock revelation about Raquel and Rock Island. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Meet Cute Crush: Henry and Ray try to help Piper carry out a "meet cute" with a new boy she likes from school. (S4, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Give Me a Break-Up: Phoebe's relationship with her superhero boyfriend is put to the test when he is offered an assignment overseas. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: Victorious

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.desc: The Thunder Games - Part 2: A supervillain with a connection to the Thunderman family may force Max and Phoebe to sacrifice their dream in order to save the people they care about. (S4, ep 13)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries

programme.desc: The Case of the Sleepover Secret / The Case of the Big Mouth Challenge: Pixie is furious when something she privately told Ava is made public. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Pestering Prank Caller / The Case of the Spoiled Sports Day: When a prank caller targets Ezra and his neighbours, Maudie believes the Inbestigators can track down the caller. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock
programme.desc: Old Comb: Min has a nice comb that's made of precious old wood. But Tee Zeng accidently breaks it into two. Kung Fu Sock suggests Tee Zeng to come clean. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Guiltrip: When Reflekta locks herself into a bottomless abyss of guilt, Ladybug calls on an ally with unfailing optimism. (S4 Ep11)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Dance, Magic, Dance!: Forced to take refuge in the Creepy Kelp Forest, the Mermicornos find themselves at the mercy of the mischievous Water Sprites. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Out of Step: Afraid to be embarrassed at a dance-off, Draculaura gives her dance partner, Clawd, enchanted dancing shoes. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: What's Up Watzie: Frankie doesn't want Watzie to migrate with other dragons, so she sets up activities for him to do instead. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Pyramid Scheme: Cleo wants the lead role for the school play and raids her family's ancient tomb for a perfect, superior costume. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Crushed: Frankie doesn't make the fearleading team. They bottle up their feelings and cause unintended electrical outbursts. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Gliding: The Lemmings kite surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite to win she-bear's affection. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Sound of a Lemming: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear in the Wind: The Lemmings play a new game but interrupt Grizzy watching his favourite TV show. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Construction Bear: Grizzy decides to build a building to impress she-bear. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Kung Fu Lemmings: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Midsummer Bear's Dream: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight but is woken up by the Lemmings blasting music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intellectual Bear: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his head, Grizzy is transformed into a being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear and the Butterfly: Grizzy wants to offer a butterfly to the she-bear he's in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens he's spotted. (S1 Ep58)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Get Off My Tennis Shoes: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight! (S1 Ep59)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Babysitting: Grizzy babysits for the bear he has a crush on. There's no question of Grizzy tripping up, for he has no intention of taking any risks! (S1 Ep60)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Lock and Key: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger's brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. (S1 Ep61)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Blues: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. (S1 Ep62)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Snow Lemmings: Grizzy craves ice cream on a hot day, but the Lemmings have used strawberry-vanilla ice cream to create a sled run in the backyard. (S1 Ep63)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Augmented Bear: The Lemmings have discovered a new game: an augmented reality program on the ranger's digital tablet. (S1 Ep64)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Under Pressure: The only edible food left in the ranger's cabin is a salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice in the freezer. Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. (S1 Ep65)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings in Space: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fireworks. (S1 Ep66)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Sniffer Sniffler Raccoon: Grizzy's last jar of chocolate spread has been pinched by the Lemmings, who are savouring it in secret. (S1 Ep67)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Transformational Bear: Grizzy uses the Lemmings' radio-controlled toy robot as a butler. (S1 Ep68)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Shaken-Up Bear: The vibrations created by Grizzy's snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. (S1 Ep69)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Piñata Party: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the ranger's living room. (S1 Ep70)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Game: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. The events displayed in the squares that the players land on come true in real life. (S1 Ep71)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Ranger Lemming: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. (S1 Ep72)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Luck: After making a fool of himself in front of she-bear, Grizzy finds a four-leaf clover which seems to bring him good luck. Could his chance be changing? (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Charm: Grizzy believes that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. He looks through the ranger's book of fairytales, searching for a way to turn her back. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear's Best Friend: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon near the log cabin. When the lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Ghost: The Tikis and the Mirages are stuck on the Pumpkin Circuit. Corto and Mouse are sure it's haunted, but it was just trick from the Mirages...However, it made the course's robots wild! (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Eole Crash: Manta challenges Corto to a no holds barred race in the Hive. Corto accepts the challenge despite Mouse's warnings about the risks of this course. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Eye of the Tiger: Newsflash: Jade Armor stole the Golden Dragon! L.J. is appalled. Who is the imposter making her look bad? (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Pigeon 72: Mr. Ramier gets akumatized into M. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now, he can turn people into evil pigeons! To stop him, Ladybug will have to ruffle his feathers. (S4 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Psycomedian: A comedian gets akumatized into Psycomedian. Able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off faces... starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir! (S4 Ep5)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Rush Duel Resignation: Yuga wants everyone at school to Rush Duel, but the Student Council President vetoes that idea! (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Earworm: Frustrated at her classmates, Toralei and her band release earworms that control everyone's thoughts. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Growing Ghoulia: Ghoulia tries to get the top spot on Monster High's Horror Roll but unleashes a zombie invasion. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Cleo in the Kitchen: Cleo tries to make a home-cooked meal to raise Clawdeen's spirits and cure her homesickness. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Case of the Missing Squeak: Ghoulia helps Lagoona find her precious, secret toy, inspecting all of their classmates for the culprit. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Despair Bear: Ladybug faces Chloè's butler, now Despair Bear. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Gigantitan: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Gigantitan, a giant baby! (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Helping a Friend: After Yuga's loss to Nail - Luke, Gavin and Romin risk everything to help Yuga - including their ability to ever duel again!! (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Mission Dragonballs! Pilaf Gang's Big Plan!: Everyone celebrates Bulma's birthday, Trunks and Goten try to find the bingo prizes, and the Dragon Balls await the winner. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Cäctustown: Kipo and our heroes pursue the Mega Mute that destroyed Kipo's burrow and stole the Timbercats' tree into a dangerous neighbourhood known as Cäctustown. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: Flowers for She-Ra: Adora learns of She-Ra's healing powers and limitations while assisting the peaceful nature kingdom of Plumeria. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Dark Cupid: It's Valentine's Day and Kim's broken heart takes a dark turn. Ladybug and Cat Noir have their own feelings put to the test. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Darkblade: After losing the municipal election, D'Argencourt gets akumatized into 'Darkblade.' (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Miraculous:...

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Creature Clash: Frankie, fascinated by Kuma's scaritage, tries a ritual without Kuma's help and turns dead students into zombies. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Droners

programme.title: Droners

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni

programme.title: Timpo

programme.title: Part-Time Wife

programme.title: 1960s Torquay - The Perfect Holiday Destination
